attributes.review: I don’t want to take up a lot of time but all I have to say is, u messed with the wrong generation😌 you white supremacists have taken so much and now u want to take away the only thing that makes us happy. Leave tik tok alone please and thank u✨. U tried, now never try again🧚🏼‍♀️💕✨🥰
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: I thought this app would be a good way for me to support me president, but the app is just so insanely disorganized and messy. At first it looked very well put together, but the more you get into it, the more hard it is to fully understand what’s happening. I do NOT recommend this app to anyone.
attributes.title: This app is trash.

attributes.review: Wish I could give it zero stars. App never downloaded and when it did it kept asking for my card number. Then after it downloaded my phone started messing up. I think it was because of this app.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: This app is horrible as soon as I downloaded and signed in I totally got hacked on EVERYTHING social media’s google was not working there was a virus and it basically destroyed my phone I might have to get a new one the app is horrible please do not download it will destroy your phone
attributes.title: Horrible app do NOT download

attributes.review: This app completely fired my phone. I wasn’t able to do anything while it downloaded. And once I was able to it glitched and kicked e out while blaring the National anthem. I was also not able to lower my volume. If I could give it 0 stars I would.
attributes.title: Worst app ever made.

attributes.review: I started using this app recently. I noticed after downloading this app, I began receiving multiple phone calls from anonymous numbers. I also received emails from a bunch of places I’ve never even heard of. Don’t use this app. They sell your info.
attributes.title: Just Appalled

attributes.review: Absolutely terrible app shut down my phone every time I opened the app, it then proceeds to call me the n word and various other hurtful names. I tried to delete but it leaked my other hurtful names. I tried to delete but it leaked my address i don’t know what I’m supposed to do now.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Do you plan on getting rid of TikTok. Many people quit their jobs to be a full time TikTokkers. One trump abolishes TikTok many people will suffer. Also, many people spend time on TikTok instead of going outside. If there is not TikTok many people will go outside causing Covid to spike. However, Trump doesn't care if Covid spikes.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: So ✨basically✨ I downloaded this app because 💖😻Donald trumpie😻💖 was on the cover. But minutes before I downloaded this a yeti broke into my room and shot me with his freezing gun 😻✨🙈😿👎🏼😹 I had to get my finger amputated 😔🤚🏼I’ve just awoken from my 2 month coma and I can’t wait to go on tik tok😹😻✨😔😋😳🤭💖👍🏼
attributes.title: I almost froze to DEATH!!!!!!😔🤭😣😿👎🏼

attributes.review:
Honestly at this point do I even need to explain why I’m giving this app 1 star.
Considering he is trying to ban TikTok, just because gen z hurt is feelings is so stupid. Like bruh just put an age restriction on your voting polls not that hard. Also I mean if you do there’s other apps we can use.
attributes.title: Inconsequential
